column5: YOU WILL FIND in the DIARIES a LOT of POLITICS AND EVEN MORE CATS     THE PERSON who MAKES the FIRST COMMENT WILL GET TWO CATS EVERY PERSON WHO COMMENTS WILL GET A CAT     RULES IN THE DIARY WHEN YOU FIND SOMETHING in the DIARY that you LIKE YOU CAN REPOST IT AS COMMENT in the DIARY  PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN The Biden admin has unveiled plans to bring hundreds possibly thousands of deported veterans and their immediate family members back to the United States saying their removal "failed to live up to our highest values." https://t.co/o0Y0lwSfxh  REP. CLYBURN Trump could be called to testify before the House Jan. 6 panel Clyburn says."They should go wherever the facts lead."https://t.co/FFriahcqWn  REP. JACKIE SPEIER Rep. Jackie Speier on Jan. 6: "It was a traumatic experience for me and for everyone in that gallery and for many others. And for the Republicans to call it a tourist activity is so offensive. It makes for great theater but it is not reality." @MSNBC  AOC & JAMIE RASKIN Reps. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez and Jamie Raskin have sent a letter to the U.S. Anti-Doping Agency encouraging the group to rethink sprinter Sha'Carri Richardson's one-month suspension for recreational marijuana use.https://t.co/mAAWbMz8qq  REPUBLICAN CANDIDATES "As campaigns gear up for key races this year and 2022 midterms Republican candidates for state and federal offices are increasingly focused on the last election — running on the falsehood spread by Trump and his allies that the 2020 race was stolen" https://t.co/NPwQ1hEXk7  JOHN HARWOOD & THOMAS MASSIE "quit" military service? https://t.co/IOUQNQpEVX  REPUBLICAN REP. ADAM KINZINGER So much wrong with this tweet even beyond how naive it is; 1) sorry but you can’t quit the military.  2) there are about 3890 mandatory vaccines in the military already 3) you knew this when you joined.  4) THE VACCINE WORKS. Good luck with your pandering though https://t.co/tVJ8RJ9EXL  PAMALA BROWN & CAWTHORN Political expediency at its worst. @CawthornforNC telling my colleague @Acosta the lie that the election was stolen. https://t.co/7iSmRjxEld After saying the exact opposite when I pressed him in January: https://t.co/qkOJjqWwa6  ARIZONA New records obtained by The Arizona Republic reveal the efforts by Trump Rudy Giuliani and state GOP Chair Kelli Ward to pressure county supervisors.Texts and voicemails revealed multipronged attempts by Ward to halt Trump's impending loss in Arizona.https://t.co/tE9lp8afIi  NEW HAMPSHIRE The New Hampshire Supreme Court has struck down Republican-backed voter restrictions.The court agreed that the law known as Senate Bill 3 "unreasonably burdens the right to vote" in violation of the state constitution.https://t.co/i6d4FOV4BA  TRUMP The new social media site started by Trump aide Jason Miller was hacked the day it was launched. Several profiles of Trumpers like Mike Pompeo and Miller himself were defaced.https://t.co/i0SwEWdM9F  Trump asked at a rally “does anybody know the answer to that stuff?” regarding if it’s required to pay taxes on company perks.“The people who put the Trump Organization’s chief financial officer in handcuffs know the answer to that stuff” @Acosta said. https://t.co/cMWBfFKJGp
